channel.title: WK 2018 on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in WK 2018 on Rusland 1

item.title: Smiling is for fools
item.description: Three times about the Russian (non-)smile – more below the videos. Why Russians Don’t Smile (2017) Why Russians are being taught to smile (2018) See also Russians take a smiling course for the World Cup (NOS Jeugdjournaal, 2018, 3 m) and This is how Russians learn to smile for the WorldCup (Jimmy Kimmel, 2018).
